message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take 80% and you take 20%
I'll give you a slightly better offer. You can take 40% and I'll take 60%
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. How about 55-45?
I'll give you 45% and take 55%. It's getting closer to the middle, but I still think I deserve a bit more
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, Bob. 50-50 split seems fair.
